ModMetaData.name: MoHAR hediffs src
ModMetaData.author: Gouda quiche
ModMetaData.description:
Adds hediffs for humanlike beings.
- nullify/make immune to another Hediff. - make pawn a material or pawn factory - make the pawn puff some steam
Example: Use dev mode; Spawn pawn; choose MoharGuineaPig
Mod creators: The mod comes with ressources to allow some fast tests : - Textures - Xml hediff - Xml backstories - Xml race definition - Xml pawnkind definition
To allow your pawns to use these hediffs, you only need : - Dll in the assembly directory - Cml hediff definitions - A way to give your race the hediff. I used backstories but there are other ways.
